entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
